name: NONAME
description:
A long, long time ago.
Countless nations have been born and died on the continent of Shizaka.
You will explore the stories of nations, soldiers, and residents in this unknown land,
investigate and discover why these stories were told, and uncover the secrets of the Shizaka Continent, one by one.

A great war is brewing in the world of Shizaka.
Choose your nation and troops and go head-to-head with your enemies.
Countless strategies and tactics require constant thinking.


"Strategy is Eternal, Victory is in an Instant."
NONAME is a simple yet complex strategy board game.
You place nine pieces on an 8X8 game board, and you win by capturing the most territory.
But you can't just place your pieces.
You'll need to place your pieces according to an organized tactical sequence.
Enjoy multiplayer with tactics and strategy.


Unique troops: As of Early Access, there are 24 troops and 216 horses.
Each one of them has different stats, allowing for creative and unique strategies.

Set your tactics: Set the order of your 9 different pieces. With good tactics, you can easily beat your opponents.
There are 362,880 tactics in a single troop.

Tactics sharing system: NONAME allows users to share their tactics in multi-window.
Tactics used in real-time battles are posted in the online window.
When you use a tactic, your wins and losses are recorded in the tactic information.
Check out good tactics and take them home.
And find the best ones!

New tactics and strategies: You can create your own tactics and name them.
Then use them to discover new strategies in matches!

Colorful Grade: Earn colorful ratings from 1-9.
The higher your rating score, the higher your rating.
And become the best player on the server.
Rankings 1-13 will have hidden ratings.

War Situation and Logical Thinking: This game requires logical thinking and wordplay.
Arrange your pieces in a logical manner and control the flow of the battle with war situation.

Noname : https://discatgames.imweb.me/
